🗺️ VALUE STREAM MAPPING - END-TO-END FLOW
========================================

🎯 VALUE STREAM: From Concept to Production Deployment
📊 Mapping Session Date: 2025-06-24

🔄 CURRENT STATE MAP:
  1. 💡 Concept → Feature Request (Lead Time: 2 days)
     • Process Time: 4 hours | Wait Time: 44 hours
     • Quality: 85% acceptance rate

  2. 📋 Feature Request → Development Ready (Lead Time: 5 days)
     • Process Time: 8 hours | Wait Time: 112 hours
     • Quality: 90% story acceptance criteria met

  3. 🔧 Development → Testing (Lead Time: 3 days)
     • Process Time: 16 hours | Wait Time: 56 hours
     • Quality: 95% automated test coverage

  4. ✅ Testing → Production (Lead Time: 1 day)
     • Process Time: 2 hours | Wait Time: 22 hours
     • Quality: 99.5% deployment success rate

📊 CURRENT STATE METRICS:
  ⏱️ Total Lead Time: 11 days
  🔧 Total Process Time: 30 hours
  ⏳ Total Wait Time: 234 hours (87% of total time)
  📈 Process Efficiency: 13% (30h process / 234h total)

🎯 FUTURE STATE VISION:
  ⚡ Target Lead Time: 3 days (73% reduction)
  🚀 Target Process Efficiency: 40%
  🔄 Continuous Flow: Eliminate 80% of wait time
  📊 Quality: Maintain >99% while increasing speed

🔧 IMPROVEMENT OPPORTUNITIES:
  1. 🤖 Automated feature triage and sizing
  2. 🔄 Continuous integration and deployment
  3. 📋 Pull-based work management
  4. 🎯 Definition of Ready automation
